title: Nick Wright on Warriors-Nets, NBA MVP, Patrick Mahomes
description:
Bomani Jones and Nick Wright discuss the Warriors dominating the Nets in Brooklyn, including James Harden’s difficulty getting to the foul line this season, Kevin Durant’s level of play and the possibility that Steph Curry may lead Golden State to the title (7:12). Plus, the NBA MVP conversation (26:20), as well as the ups and downs of QB Patrick Mahomes and Kansas City (36:52).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
